name: tamarack
description: Micro framework for working with the chain of responsibility pattern. Port of the Tamarack .NET library.
author: Tommy Montgomery <tmont@tmont.com> (http://tmont.com/)

scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -s tamarack -e index.js > tamarack.js && ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs tamarack.js > tamarack.min.js && rm tamarack.js
